title: Follow Your Heart: Finding Purpose in Your Life and Work
description: The concepts in this book ring true with practical, applicable advice, and Matthews's lucid writing and witty stories help bring his message into sharp focus. Follow Your Heart is everything you could ask for in a self-help book. It is about doing what you love, dealing with bills and disasters, discovering your own power, and finding peace of mind. Start down the road to changing your life because as Matthews "Our mission in life is not to change the world--our mission is to change ourselves."
author: Andrew Matthews
